answers.answer: No reason to be scared... I've read a lot of responses against induction on here... if your doctor feels it's best and your body is starting the preparation for labor...somewhat dilated/effaced... there is a chance you'll breeze through it!I've been induced twice... third induction will be 11/18...I've never had any issues. It is different for each women. Trust your doctor and ask them to explain it to u next week! Good luck!!! :-)

Thank you. I asked because of hope miserable I am. I have gained 78 pounds, my feet and knees hurt, it hurts to turn side to side, peeing every 30 minutes and etc. But I feel I'm being selfish because it's gods way and I should be happy he's growing, and healthy.Wow, your day is right after mine! :-) How many weeks will you be when they induce you? How long once induced does it take to give birth?
I was induced 2 out of 3 babies, it just brings labor on, other than that it's the same as goin natural just a bit faster GL
Thanks. I go in @ 7:30 am. but my son's going to school should I keep him with me or send him. Would I have him with in the hours or later?
Dee,  do you not have any back up plan for someone to take care of your child while you are in labor?

My mother and father but he's 7 and would like to have him there after I give birth so he can see and be with his brother. But my mom said have him go to school and once I'm fully dilated to pick him up from school.

Ha I went into the Dr office today (36 weeks) n got admitted for preeclampsia. I'll b monitored for a week n then induced next Monday (37). At my 32 week u/s he weighed at 5lb1oz so ½ lb in 4 weeks puts him at about 7lbs now...7 ½ by next week. Excited for him to get here its gonna b a long week but on the plus side it went from 21 days to 7 lol
Oh wow. So your staying in the hospital until your induced? I bet you are excited. I feel the same way it's going to be a very long week for you and two weeks for me!!! Good luck!

I will get induced on friday 7, i will be exactly 39 weeks it is because gd, i would like to go on my own, i am kind of scared about induction but leaving everything on God's hands. I wish the best for you :-)
Yes I'm in the hospital till I'm being induced. *****. I was suppose to b induced at 39 weeks because of my heart problem n I live 2 hrs away from hospital but nope today changed that.
Ty:-) Wow. Yes two you both good luck. Best parts coming soon!!! :-):-):-):-):-) My little man seems so stubborn so I'm sure he will say in until I'm induced 11/17.

question: I'm 37 weeks and 1 day. Today I went into the Drs to be checked and they couldn't read the stress test. So they ended up telling me I had to go to the Hospital. Well I was there all day. Good results thank the Lord above. I'm now scheduled to be induced on 11/17 early in the morning. Last week he weighed in @ 6 pounds 14 ounces. Gaining a half pound a week. I'm happy because we have it scheduled but at the same tone hoping I go in the natural way before that date. I'm scared because I have never been induced.I had my son 7 years ago natural!!!What does being induced mean and should I be scared????
title: Being Induced
